title: Operating hours vary by day with weekend brunch
statement: STK NYC Rooftop operates Monday-Tuesday 2:30pm-11pm, Wednesday-Thursday 2:30pm-12am, Friday 2:30pm-12:30am, Saturday 10am-12:30am, Sunday 10am-12am.

citations.quote: Monday & Tuesday: 2:30pm – 11pm Wednesday & Thursday: 2:30pm – 12am Friday: 2:30pm – 12:30am Saturday: 10am – 12:30am Sunday: 10am – 12am
